title: Daily Wikipedia Page Visits
description: This is a dataset reflecting quarterly production of beer in Australia, measured in megaliters from 1956 to 2010. It exhibits clear patterns of seasonality (changes in beer production at different times of the year) and trends that change over the years. It is a useful dataset for demonstrating techniques in time series analysis, such as seasonality detection, trend analysis, ad forecasting.

idField.name: topic
idField.description: Unique topic represented on the Wikipedia page

forecastTarget.name: cube_root_num_page_visits
forecastTarget.description: Target variable: Total number of page visits on the day after taking cube root of it
